title: Ruins of Osgiliath (4R133)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. While the fellowship is at site 7T, each Ring-bound Man is defender +1. Skirmish: Spot a Ringbound Man and discard this condition to wound an opponent's Man.
Lore:	The Citadel of the Stars had fallen into ruin.
Rarity:	R
